{{cpp/experimental/fs/recursive_directory_iterator/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=fs_ts|1=
bool recursion_pending() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns {{c|true}} if the next increment will cause the directory currently referred to by {{c|*this}} to be iterated into.

This function returns {{c|true}} immediately after construction or an increment. Recursion can be disabled via {{lc|disable_recursion_pending()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the next increment will iterate into the currently referred directory, {{c|false}} otherwise.

===Exceptions===
Throws nothing.
